title: The Uncalculated risk
creator_credit: Filmspace Productions and Russ Nichols Productions
brief_description: Shows what can go wrong when inexperienced people head down river in canoes, rafts and kayaks. Stresses that prior instruction is the best means of preventing accidents.
description: Shows what can go wrong when inexperienced people head down river in canoes, rafts and kayaks. Stresses that prior instruction is the best means of preventing accidents.
